author: abcoathup
content:
Mekong is the public testnet for Pectra (pectra-devnet-4 spec):
https://mekong.ethpandaops.io/
https://blog.ethereum.org/2024/11/07/introducing-mekong-testnet

The next devnet will be pectra-devnet-5 (ideally before the holidays) https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-5

Order or timing upgrading Sepolia and Holešky hasn't been decided.  
For the Dencun upgrade we did the following: Goerli Jan 17 (epoch 231680), Sepolia Jan 30 (epoch 132608) & Holešky Feb 7 (epoch 29696), though I would expect to see a bigger gap between Sepolia and Holešky as we no longer have Goerli.
